OOC: You need to learn that when someone agrees with you, you don't have to 
argue your point further.  He won't be doing it any more, the reasons are 
irrelevant and the discussion is closed.

--part1_de.3001875f.2afd7fde_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

<HTML><FONT FACE=arial,helvetica><FONT  SIZE=2>OOC: You need to learn that when someone agrees with you, you don't have to argue your point further.  He won't be doing it any more, the reasons are irrelevant and the discussion is closed.</FONT></HTML>
